rows.label: tlk70000006_05_msg0001
rows.name:
I'm gonna go and play with my friend
today. Can't wait!

rows.label: tlk70000006_05_msg0002
rows.name:
Keep it to yourself, but we've drawn up
some blueprints for a medicine-making
machine. Pretty hi-tech stuff!

rows.label: tlk70000006_05_msg0003
rows.name:
He's a really smart cookie! He knows
all about different insects and inventing
medicines and that!

rows.label: tlk70000006_05_msg0004
rows.name:
He can't beat me when it comes to
Armu stuff, though. Not a chance!

rows.label: tlk70000006_05_msg0005
rows.name:
I can't understand a thing on the
blueprints, but I just like hearing him
talk about it. He's a real expert!

rows.label: tlk70000006_05_msg0006
rows.name:
If the machine works, maybe we'll be
able to make something that'll fix up
Freja-chan! You never know!
